task.title: Refreshing links to HTML file in Excel 2010

taskbody.context: These steps explain how to reload content of HTML file(s) from an Excel 2010 document.

step.cmd: On the menu bar, select Data Properties.
step.stepresult: The External Data Range Properties dialog box is opened.

step.cmd: Set the properties according to your needs and click OK. It is recommended that you select the properties Preserve Formatting and Insert entire rows for new data, clear unused cells.
Click anywhere in the cell range where the HTML file has been inserted.
On the menu bar, select Data Refresh All Refresh. (If you select Refresh All, all HTML files that the whole document refers to are reloaded.)

taskbody.result: The HTML file is reloaded and the cell range is refreshed.
